item.description:
Freedom Is Fundamental Book Club and Discussion Group is pleased to present acclaimed author James Perloff on Monday, April 12 at 6:30pm at the North Kingstown Community Center (NOT THE LIBRARY) at 10 Beach Street.

Mr. Perloff will be discussing the key elements described in his book The Shadows of Power, an expose of private influence on American foreign policy.

In The Shadows of Power, Mr. Perloff dissects the unelected group of individuals, directing U.S. foreign policy from behind the scenes.

Mr. Perloff's popular lectures are loaded with visual images, spiced with humor, and are easy to understand. This is a unique opportunity to hear part of the generally untaught history of the United States from a man who has devoted himself to the study of this topic for almost 30 years.

Please bring a friend or two (or many!) You will want to discuss this with someone during the drive home!
As always organic snacks will be provided.
ALL ARE WELCOME!

THIS LECTURE IS FREE
Mr. Perloff will be selling autographed copies of his book and donations would be happily accepted to defray the cost of this special event.


A recent review at Amazon.com of Shadows of Power:
5.0 out of 5 stars

All I want to say is that if you liked the book, you must hear James Perloff in person. He is a wealth of information and full of integrity. To top it off, he is wonderfully entertaining. He must be, after all the revelations he still had us smiling and laughing.
